DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate intervention Nut Fish base food , micro nutrient supplementation pregnancy class improve maternal birth outcome . This cluster randomize trial two arm . The intervention group receive Nut Fish base supplementation , multiple micro nutrient , pregnancy class . The control group receive government food supplementation , iron folic acid supplementation , pregnancy class .
DOC.brief_title: NutFish Nutrient Supplementation Pregnancy Class Improve Maternal Birth Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To investigate whether nut fish base food dietary supplementation deliver pregnant mother health education would benefit maternal birth outcome compare government standard care . Design . A randomize control trial implement rural community Indonesia . Intervention . The 2 trial arm control group ( government standard care ) intervention group nut fish base food dietary supplementation health education series pregnancy class . A control group receive government food supplementation package , Iron Folic acid pill pregnancy class . An intervention group receive NutFish base food supplementation , multiple micro nutrient , pregnancy class . As pilot study , intervention package deliver research team member . Subjects . A total 72 first trimester pregnant mother enrol 36 pregnant mother group . Outcome measure . Maternal outcome 1 2 month intervention namely weight increment , energy protein intake , mid upper arm circumference , complication . Birth outcomes include APGAR score , birth weight length , preterm birth . Analysis . Linear , logistic multinomial logistic regression .
DOC.criteria: First trim pregnancy Anemic Mid Upper Arm Circumference < 23.5cm weight gain Plan deliver village midwife residence study area severe anemia < 7.0g/dl
